table.name: vtiger_terminales
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_terminales` ( `terminalesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `firma` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `gds` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `atid` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `cid` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `emision` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `oficina` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `observacion` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`terminalesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_terminalescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_terminalescf` ( `terminalesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`terminalesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
